statement.p: Find the area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({8.89}+{6.53}\right)}={30.84}\approx{30.8}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{6.53}\cdot{7.01}={45.7753}\approx{45.8}.
